descriptionHtml:
Didn't like the default Lydia, so I made her look better.
I recommend you use Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE-.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666
I also recommend you use Better Females by Bella if you want Lydia to look like what she does in the pictures.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

-Requirements-
Apachii's Sky Hair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Brows
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?

-Special Thanks To-
foretrenty for Skyrim NPC Editor
apachii for ApachiiSkyHair
Hvergelmir for Brows
Bella for Better Females by Bella
author: Whachapatcha
